scripts.android: cd ./android && ./gradlew app:assembleDebug && ./gradlew installDebug && cd ../ && node node_modules/react-native/local-cli/cli.js start --port 8082
scripts.rebuild: rm -rf ios; rm -rf android; react-native upgrade; rm -f .babelrc; rm -f .buckconfig; rm -f .flowconfig; rm -f .watchmanconfig; rm -f .gitattributes;
